name: ComponentGroup
description: A group of components that can be referenced together as a unit.

Id.description: Unique identifier for the component group.

Directory.description: Default directory for components in this group.

Source.description: Source directory for files in this group.

examples.code:
<ComponentGroup Id="ProductComponents" Directory="INSTALLFOLDER">
  <Component Guid="*">
    <File Source="app.exe" />
  </Component>
  <Component Guid="*">
    <File Source="app.dll" />
  </Component>
</ComponentGroup>
